attributes.action: Allow Ambulances to use Bus Lanes
attributes.additional_details: Allow Ambulances to use bus lanes. At present Taxis carrying passengers or not are allowed in Certain Bus lanes where as Ambulances carrying or going to pick up patients are not allowed in bus lanes sometimes causing patients to be late for appointment's or even having appointments cancelled due to late arrival.Surely this can not be right Government departments should be working together.A change in regulations is needed. Please support this e-petition if you agree.
